original_title: ทองดีฟันขาว
overview: Based on a real warrior from Thailands Ayutthaya period, 'Broken Sword Hero' follows the heroics of legendary military general Thongdee. From the disparity as a young runaway to the toughest warrior among his people, a legendary fighter with unparalleled skills in Muay Thai and swordplay, fights for the freedom of his people.
tagline: Legend of the muay thai warrior.
title: Broken Sword Hero
